name: Clash Royale Battle
description:
Do you play Clash Royale? This is a game based off collecting cards and using the cards on a battle with other players, in this case, bots. Collect cards! Create the best combination of cards! Win Battles! Go higher in the ranks! Requires a decent computer for optimal experience. Full update log can be seen here: https://discord.gg/aZWVJqf . As Youtubers usually get access to developer iPad to try the new features, this game will get access to those too(not all, like laggy thing[skeleton army, minion horde, etc.], buildings, etc.)

I don't like this, that... well head over to https://trello.com/b/nx3rW6Hr/clash-royale-battle and post suggestions there!

Development has been stopped.

Latest feature: Jungle update
